about_the_game:
The Ruined Ekko Skin is included with the CONVERGENCE: A League of Legends Story™ Deluxe Edition

Content Includes:
The Ruination comes to Zaun with the Ruined Ekko skin and Z-Trail. Ruined Ekko skin and Z-Trail will be equipable once Elie opens her shop at the beginning of Chapter II.
